title: Connecting devices to Pixel 3 hotspot
content:
New Pixel 3 on Verizon, just got hotspot enabled, however can only connect if I turn security off on Pixel  3. Security choices are WPA2 PSK or none on Pixel 3, but laptop connections show WPA Personal and cannot connect unless security is off. 
  Do not want to have hot spot on without security, any ideas?
